member.name: T:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractsClient
member.summary:
Adds support for legal identities, smart contracts and signatures to an XMPP client.
The interface is defined in the IEEE XMPP IoT extensions: https://gitlab.com/IEEE-SA/XMPPI/IoT

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractsClient.NamespaceLegalIdentities
member.summary: urn:ieee:iot:leg:id:1.0

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractsClient.#ctor(Waher.Networking.XMPP.XmppClient,System.String)
member.summary:
Adds support for legal identities, smart contracts and signatures to an XMPP client.
The interface is defined in the IEEE XMPP IoT extensions: https://gitlab.com/IEEE-SA/XMPPI/IoT
member.param: XMPP Client to use.
Address to the contracts component.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractsClient.IdentityUpdated
member.summary: Event raised whenever the legal identity has been updated by the server. The identity is validated before the event is raised. Invalid identities are discarded.
